summary: A suite of unit tests that validate host version tracking and overriding logic within a build system, covering scenarios such as differing references, package handling, overridden hosts without builds, version specifications, transitive dependencies, user channel constraints, version ranges, and error conditions when hosts are missing or contexts are incorrect.
business_intent: Guarantee correct functionality of host version management in automated builds, ensuring that overrides, version ranges, and dependency resolutions behave as expected and that misconfigurations are detected early.
